meanings.definition: A person who is trained and licensed to practice dentistry.
meanings.sent1: My mom is a dentists and she helps keep my teeth healthy.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the dentists next week for a check-up.
meanings.sent3: Why did the dentists go to the beach? To fill up on some 'toothpaste'!
meanings.sent4: The dentists in our town are like superheroes, fighting against cavities and tooth decay.
meanings.sent5: The dentists carefully examined each tooth, making sure to clean them thoroughly.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'dentist'.
meanings.sent1: There are many dentists working at the clinic to help patients with their oral health.
meanings.sent2: The dentists in the office are all very friendly and skilled.
meanings.sent3: The dentists gathered for a group photo, showing off their bright smiles.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of dentists, dental problems don't stand a chance!
meanings.sent5: The dentists worked together seamlessly, like a well-oiled machine.
